text: Just you wait and see Murray & Roberts coming out of this with just a slap on the wrist #BridgeCollapse
Took 3 hours but arrived home safely. Others were not as lucky. Sad day in Jozi. #BridgeCollapse
A huge thank u to @Netcare911_sa and @ER24EMS and all other emergency services providing care today at the #BridgeCollapse.Heros indeed.
Bridge collapse: It could be 2 things, shady tender given to a non experieced company by people who controlled the process or pure sabotage
"@AbortedNews: Will Murray and Roberts take responsibility for the #BridgeCollapse or will they cross the bridge when they get there"
